title: Samsung adds Galaxy S22 and Galaxy Tab S8 series devices to its Remote Test Lab
content:
In a bid to help app developers test their apps on its latest flagships, Samsung has now added the Galaxy S22Â and Galaxy Tab S8 series devices to its Remote Test Lab. For the unaware, Samsung’s Remote Test Lab (RTL) service gives app developers a way to test their apps on real Samsung Galaxy devices connected

The post Samsung adds Galaxy S22 and Galaxy Tab S8 series devices to its Remote Test Lab appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has added the Galaxy S22 and Galaxy Tab S8 series devices to its Remote Test Lab Service. Read on to learn more.
